content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to current market trends as it is beyond my scope. However, it is highly possible that COVID-19 pandemic may have affected the pricing of workwear. Companies may be incurring additional costs to meet health and safety protocols, such as increased sanitation and sterilization of workwear, which may drive up the cost of the workwear. Certain types of workwear, such as protective gear for healthcare workers, may also see an increase in demand and thus an increase in price. It is recommended to check with industry-specific suppliers for the most up-to-date information.
